item.description:
We will have our own field and instructors and they will provide the firearms and the rounds (25 shots). No experience necessary. They also have a cash bar and a dining area, so if there's enough interest when we get there, they'll even order pizza for us and have it delivered (additional charge, of course).

So let's shoot the breeze and then tell tall tales about it over lunch!

Unfortunately, MMSC couldn't accommodate our group for Sunday, so this event now takes place SATURDAY, SEPTEMBER 18, 11:00 am. Please double-check your schedule and update your RSVP if necessary. The club is restricting us to 20 people. I'll need to give them a final headcount the Wednesday before, so RSVPs will be open until 2pm on September 15.

More info to come....
item.name: Trap shooting: It ain't paintball! ($30/pp)
